title: Account suspended untill yesterday (still cant log in)
body: I got an email that said i was suspended untill 1. January. The date has passed and i still cant log in. ANyone else have this problem before? do i need to confirm anything somewhere?

replies.body: Looking at your account this is a much larger ban that may extend past January 1st; I'm not sure where you received a message that said it would be lifted then, but lets definitely get you a ticket to our Game Support team to discuss this more in private. [**Hit them up over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
